arts.ttl: Lazio Boss Marco Baroni Offers His Assessment of Heartbreaking Atalanta Draw
arts.sum: Marco Baroni is adamant Lazio players should be proud of themselves following a heart-wrenching 1-1 draw against Atalanta. It wasn't the ideal way to close things in 2024, yet the Biancocelesti will finish the calendar year in the Serie A top four. The post Lazio Boss Marco Baroni Offers His Assessment of Heartbreaking Atalanta Draw appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Atalanta show their mettle at Lazio to keep in-form Inter off Serie A summit
arts.sum: Marco Brescianini scores in 88th minute to earn 1-1 draw Martínez ends drought in Inter’s 3-0 win at Cagliari Atalanta’s 11-match winning streak in Serie A ended with a 1-1 draw at Lazio, but Marco Brescianini’s 88th-minute equaliser kept them top of the table. Fourth-placed Lazio dominated the first half in Rome and were rewarded in the 27th minute when Nicolò Rovella played a high through ball to Fisayo Dele-Bashiru, who cut inside the box and sent a bouncing volley into the net to break. But Gian Piero Gasperini’s relentless side kept pushing and earned a draw in a thrilling finish to the game. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: “We hope to complete what we couldn’t in the summer” – Gasperini reflects on Atalanta’s draw with Lazio
arts.sum: Atalanta’s impressive run of 11 consecutive Serie A victories came to an end as they faced Lazio, resulting in a 1-1 draw at the Stadio Olimpico. Fisayo Dele-Bashiru opened the scoring for Lazio in the first half, but Marco Brescianini equalized late in the match, allowing Atalanta to maintain their position at the top of the league table. Following the match, Atalanta head coach Gian Piero Gasperini shared his thoughts with Sky Sport. He remarked, “We expected a Lazio like this; they are capable of such performances. One half for each team. We struggled at first to contain their speed, The post “We hope to complete what we couldn’t in the summer” – Gasperini reflects on Atalanta’s draw with Lazio appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Atalanta stay top of Serie A with late equaliser at Lazio
arts.sum: A late equaliser from Marco Brescianini keeps Atalanta top of Serie A as they earn a point at Lazio.

arts.ttl: Atalanta’s Tony D’Amico: ‘Inter don’t pressure us’
arts.sum: Tony D'Amico, the sporting director of Atalanta, spoke to Sky before the team's match against Lazio, reflecting on their recent performances and the upcoming challenges. His comments came in light of Inter Milan's recent 3-0 victory over Cagliari, which has put pressure on other teams in the league.
